reviewText: playback excellent.  movie plots go from good to very good

*Within the Rock is $24, seperately, so this collection is a better option. It, by far, is the best of the three movies. * The Fear 2 stars the guy that played The Anti-Christ in, the original, Left Behind: The Collection (Left Behind / Left Behind II: Tribulation Force / Left Behind: World at War), kinda weird... I thought it really WAS a Russian actor [in Left Behind]. His accent was more believable than T-H-I-S extremely bloody flick's rubber monster. *Dario Argento's Phantom of the Opera, seperate, is $6.50. This film is sorta like a combination of the 1980 "soft-porn" Caligula (Unrated Edition), with the story you're familiar with, but, WITH full-frontal male/female nudity... yet seems S0Oo MUCH longer [time-wise] than its 1:39. Speaking of its time [1:39], this film's aspect-ratio is 1.85:1, yet the opening and closing credits are window-boxed (that is, there're black bars all around... not just on the opposite sides); which turns to pan-and-scan for the bulk of the movie, with black bars, right and left. Steven Spielberg calls pan-and-scan movies [where 1/3rd of the picture is lost on the sides] "crap-o-vision". Enough said.
a decent dvd set if got it for the third movie within the rock

Phantom of the Opera/ The Fear 2/ Within the Rock is a Triple Feature DVD that I bought strictly for Within the Rock. It's a good little movie about an Alien Creature that kills a mining team on an asteroid. In my opinion, the other 2 movies are barely watchable. (Although, I'm sure they have fans, as most z grade movies have fans somewhere.)

Worth buying for Within The Rock alone as that feature is the best on offer here, A crew on an asteroid (they are there to drill deep enough to blow it up to save earth, yes that old line again) encounter a nasty alien creature.
Fear is about a Halloween party that goes wrong with the guests being slain, not a bad effort for what it is.
Opera was pretty boring, almost putting me to sleep.
So Within The Rock and Fear are not bad for the price of this set.
